description:
When trying to terminate an instance that failed  using nova Version: 2012.1~rc1~20120308.13246-0ubuntu0ppa1~oneiric1 

euca-terminate-instances i-00000007

title: ERROR nova.rpc.amqp [-] Exception during message handling

comments.content:
When trying to terminate an instance that failed  using nova Version: 2012.1~rc1~20120308.13246-0ubuntu0ppa1~oneiric1
